title: Monster Halloween
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 227 words, Level G (Grade 1), Lexile 420L, Fiction Series
description: It's Halloween, and Bonk has all kinds of costumes for his Monster friends--but nothing for himself! The other monsters try making ghost and mummy costumes, but these don't work out. Finally, Uzzle gets some orange paper, black paint, and a perfect idea.
reviewWords: costumes, cowboy, Halloween, mummy, pirate, pumpkin
awareness: Segment and Blend Phonemes                : Orally segment and blend phonemes
phonics: Variant Vowels : Recognize different sounds for variant vowel oo
